title: Puck's Legacy
description: In the dusty lights of a deserted theatre a bored young woman makes a desperate decision, and the line between reality and fiction becomes perilously thin.The stage is set. The performance will be captivating. But there are many more entrances than there are exits.And what about you?Are you an audience member?Or a witness?"If we shadows have offended, think but this and all be mended, that you have but slumbered here, while these visions did appear ... "Or so says Puck. But what if not everybody was pretending?DO read the trigger warnings below if there are topics which would not be good for you. I have tried to avoid spoilers as far as possible. Stay safe.Trigger Suicide references, dangerous or illegal activity, some bad language, some references to sex and sexual violence, mental health themes.
author: Katie Hall-May
